description: This classic Greek condiment is refreshing to the palate. Pairs perfectly with Pita or crudites as a snack or appetiser
keywords: Dipping sauce,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Classic Greek Tzatziki Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large cucumber, peeled, de-seeded and grated
3 cloves garlic, peeled and finely diced

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the cucumber by peel, slicing and then grating. Drain all the excess liquid from the cucumber by using kitchen roll or a muslin cloth.
Now combine all ingredients in a bowl and mix fully before serving. Serve with a selection of condiments.
